rows.label: kizunainn023_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey, Meleph. Do you know if there's
a place round here with a good view
of the whole town?

rows.label: kizunainn023_msg0002
rows.name:
A good view of Alba Margen...
Hmmm...

rows.label: kizunainn023_msg0003
rows.name:
As I recall, you can see a great vista
from Hadashal Palace... Like the
second Wing Area, Grian, for instance.

rows.label: kizunainn023_msg0004
rows.name:
That sounds awesome!
Think you could show me up there?
